item.title: Camila Cabello & Shawn Mendes - Señorita - Key of C - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Señorita by Camila Cabello & Shawn Mendes from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: Am, Cmaj7, Em, F, G.

item.title: Shawn Mendes - If I Can't Have You - Key of G - Andy Ramos
item.description: Play along video for the song If I Can't Have You by Shawn Mendes from the channel Andy Ramos. Chords used in the song: Bm7, Em7, F♯m, G.

item.title: Shawn Mendes - Lost In Japan - Key of A - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Lost In Japan by Shawn Mendes from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: Amaj7, Bm7, Dmaj7, F♯m.

item.title: Shawn Mendes - Mercy - Key of D - Andy Ramos
item.description: Play along video for the song Mercy by Shawn Mendes from the channel Andy Ramos. Chords used in the song: A, Bm, D, Em, G.

item.title: Shawn Mendes - In My Blood - Key of F - Andy Ramos
item.description: Play along video for the song In My Blood by Shawn Mendes from the channel Andy Ramos. Chords used in the song: B♭, Dm, F.

item.title: Shawn Mendes - Stitches - Key of C - Kevin Way
item.description: Play along video for the song Stitches by Shawn Mendes from the channel Kevin Way. Chords used in the song: Am, C, F, G.
